name: Vallarta Food Tours’ Taste Of Pitillal Food Tour
description: Our Pitillal Food Tour uncovers life in a typical Mexican town. You’ll experience the life of a local as you stroll the streets, square, and side streets of Pitillal. Explore Mexico’s sophisticated flavors and vast spectrum of regional cooking styles in a town untouched by tourism. Bypass the language and cultural barriers and join us as we take you behind the scenes in the heart of Vallarta’s most undiscovered food destination. After our guided tour, explore Pitillal with a newfound appreciation of Mexican culture and customs while taking advantage of helpful recommendations from your tour guide on the area’s full range of restaurants and specialty food stores.
